tool_description: Collects and analyzes opinions from art historians, conservators, and other experts regarding the attribution and authenticity of an artwork.

artwork_title.description: Title of the artwork being evaluated

expert_names.description: Names of experts who provided opinions

expert_specializations.description: Areas of expertise for each expert

authenticity_opinions.description: Expert opinions on authenticity (authentic, attributed, questionable, fake)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: expert_names, expert_specializations, opinion_dates, and authenticity_opinions must have the same length.
Invalid authenticity opinion: Opinions must be one of [authentic, attributed, questionable, fake, insufficient_evidence].
Invalid confidence level: Confidence levels must be one of [high, medium, low].
Invalid date format: Opinion dates must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
usage: Aggregate expert opinions on artwork authenticity to provide a comprehensive scholarly consensus. The tool weighs opinions based on expert qualifications and specialization relevance.

weighted_authenticity_score.description: Weighted authenticity score based on expert consensus (0-100)

key_disagreements.description: Major points of disagreement among experts
